TestDescription.name: JIRA Security Advisory 2013-02-21
TestDescription.Description: This advisory details critical security vulnerabilities that we have found in JIRA and fixed in recent versions of JIRA. These vulnerabilities affect all versions of JIRA up to and including [bold]5.1.4[/bold]. [break][break] [ul] [li]Issue 1: File Overwrite Vulnerability[/li] [/ul]
TestDescription.Impact: Consult web references to determine the impact of each particular vulnerability.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Customers who have downloaded and installed JIRA should upgrade their existing JIRA installations or apply the patches to fix these vulnerabilities.
